alert.note: Alert for Bullitt; Hardin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 12:51PM EDT until May 16 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Hardin County in central Kentucky... Southwestern Bullitt County in central Kentucky... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1251 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Elizabethtown, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Radcliff, Vine Grove, Lebanon Junction, Long View, Howe Valley, Vertrees, Addington Field Airport, Crest and Saint John. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm may cause serious injury and significant property damage.
